Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.objects.addressing

Class AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.objects.addressing.AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder
public class AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder extends Object
Central API for obtaining MessageRouting for sending V2xMessages via ad hoc communication.

  • Method Details

    • build

      public MessageRouting build()
      Build a MessageRouting object based on the values configured through the AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder. Needs at least the destination and the routing strategy to have been set.
      Returns:
      MessageRouting

    • build

      public MessageRouting build(DestinationAddressContainer dac)
      Build a MessageRouting object based on the given DestinationAddressContainer.
      Returns:
      MessageRouting

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this builder

      public AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder geographical(GeoArea area)
      Configures the message to use a geographically-scoped routing strategy.
      Parameters:
      area - the area which the message will be transmitted to.
      Returns:
      this builder.

    • hops

      public AdHocMessageRoutingBuilder hops(int hops)
      Sets the maximum number of hops in the routing to the given number.
      Parameters:
      hops - the maximum number of hops that should be possible in routing.
      Returns:
      this builder.
